product_overview: Skill Probe LMS is a robust and integrated Learning Management System designed to connect students, mentors, ambassadors, employers, and administrators through a seamless platform. It empowers skill development, live and recorded course management, career services, and referral-driven growth, supported by secure authentication, real-time communication, and multi-gateway payment processing.
core_goals: Enable seamless multi-role user authentication with advanced security measures
Provide a comprehensive course management system supporting live and recorded content
Facilitate campus ambassador referral programs with real-time tracking and payouts
Offer integrated career services through job posting and application management
Support multi-gateway payment and subscription processing with wallet functionality
Ensure high system performance, scalability, availability, and security
Deliver an intuitive, mobile-first, accessible user interface with role-specific dashboards
key_features: Multi-role user authentication system with JWT tokens, OTP, and social login
Full-featured course management supporting multimedia content, live sessions via Google Meet, enrollments, and progress tracking
Campus ambassador program with referral code generation, point-based rewards, and payout management
Job portal allowing employers to post jobs, manage applications, and schedule interviews
Multi-gateway payment processing integrating Stripe and Razorpay with subscription and wallet support
Real-time communication via live chat, Q&A, and notifications through email, SMS, and push
Comprehensive security framework including rate limiting, encryption, and input validation
Analytics and reporting dashboards covering user progress, ambassador ROI, financials, and system usage
user_flow_summary: User Registration with OTP verification, role selection, profile setup, and dashboard access
Mentor Course Creation involving content upload, pricing configuration, live session scheduling, and publication
Student Course Enrollment including discovery, payment processing, and immediate course access
Ambassador Application submission, admin approval, referral code generation, and referral tracking
Employer Job Posting, candidate review, application tracking, and interview scheduling
Payment processes covering course purchases, subscription management, wallet transactions, and invoice generation
validation_criteria: Support registration and login via email, phone OTP, and social providers securely
Successfully create, schedule, and deliver live and recorded courses with real-time attendance tracking
Accurately track ambassador referrals, credit points, and manage payout requests
Process payments through multiple gateways securely with retry and failure handling
Allow employers to post jobs and manage applications with status updates and notifications
Achieve API response time under 500ms and system uptime exceeding 99.5%
Ensure all user interfaces are responsive, WCAG 2.1 AA compliant, and maintain consistent design
Pass security testing confirming prevention of injection, cross-site scripting, and enforcing role-based access
